response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to us due to its unique features, unparalleled craftsmanship, and the significant investment we've made in research and development. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, potentially enhancing its functionality, prestige, or profitability. Given its exceptional nature, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we'll arrange for the necessary documentation and logistics promptly. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and hope to contribute to your success with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 950000}
